Detailed Description

User related functions

Function Documentation

wtUserAssignToGroup ( $  group,
$  user = NULL 
)

Assigns a user to a group

Parameters:
$group The name of the group to assign the user to
Returns:
TRUE on success, -1 if the user is already assigned to this group, FALSE on error

wtUserCreate ( $  name,
$  password,
$  groups = NULL 
)

Creates a new user

Parameters:
$name the name of the new user (case-sensitive)
$password the user password.
$groups an array of initial groups the user belongs to or NULL for no groups.
Returns:
A positive value on success, -1 if the user already exists, FALSE on error

wtUserExists ( $  name  ) 

Checks if a user exists in the database

Parameters:
$name The user name
Returns:
TRUE if a record of this users exists in the database, else FALSE.

wtUserGroupCreate ( $  name,
$  desc = "" 
)

Creates a new user group

Parameters:
$name the name of the new group
$desc Optional: The group description
Returns:
An integer containing the unique group identifier (GID), -1 if the group already exists, FALSE on error
